gOnline.title: gOnline
gOnline.heroTitle: One place to run all your online orders
gOnline.tagline: One place to run all your online orders.
gOnline.heroSubtitle: Centralize delivery platforms, POS integrations, and menus — and keep every order flowing smoothly.
gOnline.description: Connected channels. Smarter workflows. Everything your business needs. One platform.
gOnline.madeFor: Made for busy teams, peak hours, and zero room for mistakes.

whatIs.title: What is gOnline?
whatIs.description: gOnline connects your restaurant to delivery platforms and POS systems, automates order workflows, and gives you one dashboard to manage online ordering, menus, and performance.

benefits.title: Connect delivery platforms and POS systems
benefits.description: Stop hopping between tablets. gOnline integrates with leading food aggregators, POS software, and third-party apps — so everything stays connected.

benefits.title: Manage every order from one screen
benefits.description: See what's happening in real time — and keep orders moving without chaos.

benefits.title: Keep menus accurate everywhere
benefits.description: Update once. Stay consistent across delivery platforms — even across brands and locations.
features: Unified menu control and instant modifications

benefits.title: Improve delivery operations
benefits.description: Track fulfillment and performance across platforms — so you can reduce delays and protect service quality.
features: Operational visibility from prep to handoff

benefits.title: Understand performance (and prevent cancellations)
benefits.description: Know what sells, what slows you down, and what gets cancelled — with reporting you can actually use.

comparison.title: gOnline vs manual workflows
comparison.subtitle: Stop managing tablets. Start managing your business.
manual: Menu updates done platform by platform
Manual order routing and missed tickets
Hard to track performance across channels

ctaSection.title: Online orders. Fully under control.
ctaSection.description: Centralize platforms, menus, and POS integrations — and keep every order flowing smoothly.

benefits.title: Increase Revenue

gKDS.title: gKDS
gKDS.heroTitle: Keep the kitchen moving. In real time.
gKDS.description: A kitchen display system (KDS) that replaces paper tickets, routes orders automatically, and keeps every station in sync — so service stays fast and accurate.
gKDS.madeFor: Every ticket. Every station. In sync.

whatIs.title: What is gKDS?
whatIs.description: gKDS is a real-time kitchen management system that displays orders digitally, assigns tickets to the right stations, and keeps your kitchen aligned from prep to plating.

benefits.title: Replace paper tickets with live kitchen screens
benefits.description: Run every shift with clarity — and stop losing orders in the rush.
features: Interactive digital order display for every station

benefits.title: Smart order routing, straight from your POS
benefits.description: Keep front-of-house and back-of-house perfectly aligned.
features: Orders automatically routed to the right stations

benefits.title: Automated ticket management that reduces errors
benefits.description: No missed items. No misreads. No confusion.
features: Bump bar integration for quick completion
Color-coded priorities for speed and accuracy
Fewer mistakes and less food waste

benefits.title: Prep time tracking and performance visibility
benefits.description: Know what slows you down — and fix it fast.

ctaSection.title: Make every station faster — without adding pressure.
ctaSection.description: gKDS keeps your kitchen aligned, your tickets digital, and your service on time.

gkdsPlus.title: gKDS+ (for Virtual Kitchens)
gkdsPlus.description: Built for virtual kitchens — with or without a POS.
gkdsPlus.subtitle: gKDS+ routes every item to the right station, keeps multi-brand prep organized, and helps you run a dark kitchen smoothly from one system.
features: All-in-one KDS workflow for virtual kitchens
Station routing for complex multi-item orders

gDispatch.title: gDispatch
gDispatch.heroTitle: Stop chasing drivers. Start controlling deliveries.
gDispatch.heroSubtitle: gDispatch automates assignment, optimizes routes, and gives you live visibility from pickup to drop-off.
gDispatch.description: gDispatch automates delivery assignment, optimizes routes, and tracks drivers in real time. You get full visibility and control from pickup to drop-off — so every order arrives on time.

whatIs.title: What is gDispatch?
whatIs.description: gDispatch helps restaurants manage the last mile with automated driver assignment, live tracking, and route optimization — whether you run your own fleet, use third-party drivers, or both.

benefits.title: Automated dispatch that keeps orders moving
benefits.description: Assign drivers instantly and reduce delays — without manual coordination.

benefits.title: Real-time driver tracking and live delivery monitoring
benefits.description: Know where every driver is — and what's happening with every order.
features: Order status updates across the delivery lifecycle

benefits.title: Smarter routes. Faster deliveries.
benefits.description: Optimize route planning automatically and keep ETAs accurate.
features: Smart route assignment for multiple orders

benefits.title: Works with third-party fleet services
benefits.description: Connect to delivery partners and fleet providers without switching tools.
features: Reduce tablet juggling and operational noise

benefits.title: Delivery insights that drive performance

comparison.title: Your deliveries, on your terms.

ctaSection.title: Stop chasing deliveries. Start controlling them.

gPicker.title: gPicker
gPicker.heroSubtitle: gPicker centralizes every order and guides staff through picking, printing, and dispatch with real-time updates across channels.

whatIs.title: What is gPicker?
whatIs.description: gPicker gives outlet staff one place to manage every order — from acceptance to dispatch — with real-time updates and fewer manual errors.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: A faster flow for fulfillment
howItWorks.description: All orders land in one dashboard; staff follow a guided picking flow, print what they need, and dispatch with statuses synced back instantly.

steps.title: Receive
steps.description: All incoming orders from every aggregator, POS, and channel appear instantly in one view.

steps.title: Pick / Prepare
steps.description: A streamlined picking view walks staff through each order to confirm items, note shortages, and keep fulfillment moving.

steps.title: Print
steps.description: One-tap Bluetooth printing for picking slips, labels, and receipts.

steps.title: Dispatch
steps.description: Complete the order and hand it over with confidence. Statuses sync back to aggregators and POS for accurate visibility.

items.title: One unified order dashboard
items.description: No more switching between aggregator tablets.
features: See unclaimed and in-progress orders at a glance
Supports grocery, food, and mixed-item baskets
Real-time updates for customer modifications and cancellations

items.title: Real-time store control
items.description: Open or close stores instantly across brands and aggregators.
features: Open/close stores in real time across connected channels
Bulk toggle: switch all channels ON/OFF instantly
Search and filter by brand or aggregator

items.title: Real-time item control
items.description: Fix availability issues in seconds — without disrupting operations.
features: Search items or modifiers and mark unavailable
Bulk actions for multiple items at once
Changes sync instantly across connected menus

items.title: Partial fulfillment
items.description: Keep orders moving even when items are missing — no full cancellation required.
features: Mark missing items as unavailable instantly
Send updated quantities directly to the aggregator
Order continues smoothly with only the necessary adjustments

items.title: Smart substitution workflow
items.description: Handle stock variances without slowing down fulfillment.
features: Suggested alternatives based on catalog setup
Updates sync back to aggregators in real time
Reduces cancellations and keeps customers satisfied

items.title: POS sync
items.description: Cleaner handovers. Fewer errors. Better accuracy.
features: Orders flow from POS → gPicker without delays or mismatches
Item changes, availability updates, and cancellations sync in real time

items.title: QR accuracy
items.description: Instant identification, faster handovers.
features: Eliminates manual entry and mis-typed order numbers
Speeds up handover to POS, ERP systems, or packing stations

items.title: Scheduled orders
items.description: Prep ahead without the rush.
features: Scheduled orders are clearly marked in the dashboard
Staff can prep items ahead of pickup/delivery window
Ensures orders are ready at the intended time

ctaSection.title: Fulfillment, handled.
ctaSection.description: Centralize every order and keep fulfillment moving — from receiving to dispatching — without switching screens or losing track.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Grubtech

questions.question: What is Grubtech?
questions.answer: Grubtech is a comprehensive restaurant management platform that connects all your systems - from online orders to POS to delivery - in one unified solution.

questions.question: Which delivery platforms does Grubtech integrate with?
questions.answer: We integrate with all major delivery platforms including Uber Eats, Deliveroo, Talabat, and many more. Our platform supports 250+ integration partners.

questions.question: Is Grubtech suitable for small restaurants?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer gOnline Lite specifically designed for independent restaurants and SMBs with affordable pricing and essential features.

questions.question: How long does it take to set up Grubtech?
questions.answer: Most restaurants are up and running within 48 hours. Our team provides full onboarding support to ensure a smooth transition.

questions.question: Do I need special hardware to use Grubtech?
questions.answer: No special hardware is required. Grubtech works on any modern device with an internet connection. However, we do offer kitchen display systems if needed.

questions.question: Can Grubtech help me reduce order errors?
questions.answer: Yes! Our Kitchen Display System (gKDS) has been shown to reduce order errors by up to 90% through real-time order display and automated workflows.

questions.question: Does Grubtech provide analytics and reporting?
questions.answer: Yes, gData provides comprehensive analytics and reporting with real-time insights into your operations, sales, and performance metrics.

questions.question: What kind of support does Grubtech offer?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support via phone, email, and chat. Our team is always ready to help you with any questions or issues.

faq.noResults: No FAQs found matching your search. Try different keywords or contact our support team.

cta.headline: One system. Full control.
cta.subheading: Everything your restaurant runs on — orders, kitchens, deliveries, and data — in one place. Trusted by restaurant operators across multiple markets.

hero.title: Where innovation meets the kitchen
hero.subtitle: Grubtech is built for the fast-moving world of food service. We give restaurants the tech they need to run smarter, grow faster, and serve better - no stress, just solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Grubtech was born in 2019 with one goal, to help restaurants and food businesses thrive in a digital-first world. We saw how traditional systems struggled to keep up with online orders, multiple brands, and changing customer expectations. So, we built a middleware solution - gOnline - to sync fragmented software touchpoints like POS, ERP and third-party applications, making restaurant operations smoother and scalable.
story.paragraph2: Born in the UAE, Grubtech grew fast, just like the restaurants we support. Today, we operate in Saudi Arabia, Spain, Portugal and the UK, helping businesses simplify operations, increase efficiency, and boost profitability with powerful, easy-to-use technology.
story.paragraph3: Our strength lies in our diversity. Our family, spanning the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Spain, Portugal, Sri Lanka, and beyond, bring global talent together to create tech that transforms restaurants worldwide.

items.title: Innovating Possibilities
items.description: We don't just keep up with industry trends - we stay ahead of them by exploring new possibilities. Our technology evolves so you're always equipped with the best tools to run your business.

items.title: Built Around Your Success
items.description: Your wins are our wins. We design solutions that solve real challenges, and we're always listening, improving, and supporting your growth.

items.title: Transparency At Every Step
items.description: We believe in open conversations, trust, and long-term partnerships that deliver real results. Transparency is one of our most treasured values.

items.title: Where it all started
items.description: Founded with the mission to transform restaurant technology.

items.title: Connecting the dots
items.description: Launched full-suite POS and delivery platform integrations across the UAE.

items.title: Bigger, bolder, better
items.description: Expanded to GCC markets, onboarding major enterprise brands across the region.

items.title: Changing the game
items.description: Recognized as a top innovator in food service technology.

items.title: 10 million strong, more to come
items.description:
Achieved multiple milestones:
- 10 million successful transactions processed.
- Opened new offices in Riyadh, Barcelona and Valencia.
